sentences: William Charles Mecum (May 4, 1972 â€“ April 29, 2021) was an American musician and lead guitarist for the rock band Karma to Burn (K2B).
During K2B's seven-year hiatus from 2002-2009, he played guitar for instrumental bands Treasure Cat and Dragonass.
Mecum died on April 29, 2021, as a result of a traumatic head injury, from an accidental fall.
